## crossOriginDownload() function

根据URL下载文件（解决跨域a.download不生效问题)

可定制下载成功的状态码status(浏览器原生状态码)

支持下载操作成功、失败后的回调

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function crossOriginDownload(url: string, filename: string, options?: CrossOriginDownloadParams): void;
```
